pli-tv-bu-vb-as1:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-as1:1.1_0: Venerables, these seven principles for the settling of legal issues come up for recitation.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as1:2.1_0: resolve this legal issue regarding the settling of legal issues
pli-tv-bu-vb-as1:2.2_0: Removal in the presence of those concerned is applicable.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as3:1.1_0: Removal in resolution because of past insanity
pli-tv-bu-vb-as4:1.1_0: should be reminded of what they have done,
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:2.1_0: Venerables, the seven principles for the settling of legal issues have been recited.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:2.2_0: In regard to this I will ask you:
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:2.4_0: A second time I ask the Sangha to answer:
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:2.8_0: You will remember it, please remember it; I will remember it thus.’
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:3.1_0: The section for recitation on the disciplinary issues are finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.10_0: At this fortnight he was coming downstairs for the Buddha, and the recitation of the Monastic Code.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.11_0: In regard to this everyone should train in unity, in concord, without dispute.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.2_0: the four rules on expulsion have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.3_0: the thirteen rules on suspension have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.4_0: the two undetermined rules have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.5_0: the thirty rules on relinquishment and confession have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.6_0: the ninety-two rules on confession have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.7_0: the four rules on acknowledgment have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.8_0: the rules to be trained in have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.9_0: the seven principles for the settling of legal issues have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:5.1_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis is finished.
